tree.name: Khris Middleton
tree.tradeDescription: Dallas traded Anthony Davis, D'Angelo Russell, Jaden Hardy, and Dante Exum to Washington for Middleton, AJ Johnson, Bagley III, Branham, and 5 picks
tree.note: Texas A&M forward, 2012 #39 pick by Detroit, 3x All-Star

assetsGivenUp.name: Anthony Davis
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Dallas received AD from Lakers in the Luka Doncic trade
assetsGivenUp.note: Kentucky forward, 2012 #1 pick by New Orleans

assetsGivenUp.name: Luka Doncic
assetsGivenUp.note: Real Madrid guard, drafted #3 by Atlanta, traded to Dallas on draft night

assetsGivenUp.name: Trae Young
assetsGivenUp.note: Oklahoma guard, drafted #5 by Dallas, sent to Atlanta in draft-night swap

assetsGivenUp.name: 2019 DAL 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Protected first-round pick sent to Atlanta, became #10 overall

assetsGivenUp.name: D'Angelo Russell
assetsGivenUp.note: Ohio State guard, 2015 #2 pick by Los Angeles Lakers. Signed 2-year $13M deal after being waived by Brooklyn.

assetsGivenUp.name: Jaden Hardy
assetsGivenUp.note: G League Ignite guard, drafted by Dallas

assetsGivenUp.name: Dante Exum
assetsGivenUp.note: Australian guard, 2014 #5 pick by Utah. Signed 2-year $6.15M deal after playing overseas (Barcelona, Partizan). Re-signed Sep 2025.
